thread.title: BRIEF-China Merchants Shekou Industrial's Jan Contract Sales Up, Unit To Acquire Stakem Debts In Property Firm

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Merchants Shekou Industrial's Jan Contract Sales Up, Unit To Acquire Stakem Debts In Property Firm

organizations.name: china merchants shekou industrial zone holdings co ltd

text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - China Merchants Shekou Industrial Zone Holdings Co Ltd:
* SAYS JAN CONTRACT SALES UP 77.1 PERCENT Y/Y AT 11.8 BILLION YUAN ($1.87 billion)
* SAYS UNIT SIGNS AGREEMENT TO BUY STAKE AND DEBTS IN PROPERTY FIRM FOR A COMBINED 855.5 MILLION YUAN Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2FZUdEd ; bit.ly/2EQqwWA Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2961 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
